about.title: About Meeshy
about.subtitle: We believe that language barriers should never stand in the way of meaningful connections.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Connect the world, one translation at a time. Our platform empowers people from all corners of the globe to communicate freely, breaking down the walls that separate us and building bridges of understanding.

globalAccess.title: Global Accessibility
globalAccess.description: Making multilingual communication accessible to everyone, everywhere in the world.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Using the latest AI technologies for accurate and fast translations.

privacy.title: Privacy Respect
privacy.description: Your conversations remain private and secure with server-side translation powered by advanced AI models.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Made with ❤️ by developers who believe communication should have no boundaries.
team.details: Meeshy is developed by a passionate team of developers, linguists and designers who share a common vision: a world where language is no longer an obstacle to human communication.
